attributes.action: Finally get rid of that one group of criminal kids in Camden.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Finally get rid of that one group of 30 to 40 criminal kids in Camden. Everybody knows who they are and even where some of them live. They roam the high street at moments when pubs close or when it's quite so they can rob and 'happy slap' and stab people.
We know who they are and we know where to find them. How about you? When will you finally take action?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
